output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. CMF Number: No CMF number is present, but this isn't decisive on its own.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is one of the presidential candidates (Position 3).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement with significant reach (10,000-14,999 impressions) - Published on both Facebook and Instagram - Estimated audience size of 100,001-500,000 - Spending between 100-199 RON
4. Electoral objective: Yes - The question "De ce Marcel Ciolacu?" (Why Marcel Ciolacu?) is clearly aimed at promoting him as a candidate - Uses hashtags #Echilibru (Balance) and #Stabilitate (Stability) which are campaign themes - The context and timing during elections make this clearly electoral in nature
5. Journalism: No - This is not journalistic content - It's a promotional message from PSD Dolj - Lacks any informative or educational content
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a paid, organized campaign post - Published by an official party organization (PSD Dolj) - Structured as campaign messaging

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Paid advertisement with significant reach - Published by official party organization - Uses campaign messaging and hashtags - Timing coincides with presidential campaign period
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul, cu ID-ul postarii pe facebook 1076877734172969, a fost promovat ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un buget intre 100-199 RON si o audienta estimata intre 100,001-500,000 persoane, reprezentand propaganda electorala activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea contine mesajul "De ce Marcel Ciolacu?" si hashtag-urile electorale #MarcelCiolacu #Echilibru #Stabilitate, fiind in mod clar material de propaganda electorala conform Art. 36(7).
